ABOUT ME

ABOUT ME

Hello, my name is Jesús Ríos and I'm a 28 years old Software Developer from Mexicali, BC, México.

I started my career 6 years ago in one of the biggest software companies from the region, where I had a lot of activities related to both databases and programming web and desktop applications. Through my time there I was able to work for different kind of bussiness clients around the region like: insurance, loans, investments, medical clinics, notary public offices among others.

I switched to a company where I was able to help with hybrid mobile development every once in a while, but mainly focusing on web applications for big companies in the logistics field.

After a few years I switched to one of the biggest aerospace companies in the world where I started working full-time with native mobile development and where I was able to improve my english skills.

I like to learn new technologies and put them into practice creating different projects, which you can find on my github account. My current development stack is MERN, and I'm taking an specialization from The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology on Full-Stack Web Development with React through Coursera.org, which I'm aiming on finishing by December, 2019.

I'm really passionate about programming and I consider myself a fast learner, I always want to learn more, challenge myself and never settle down.

Please, take a look at my resume:

PORTFOLIO

Trending Movies

Android, Java, SQLite

One of the first projects I created to learn Android with Java, it is basically a list of trending movies fetched from a themoviedb.org API, on it you can search for the movie you want, watch some details about it, rate it and share it with your friends, rates are saved with SQLite Plan your day and keep in control of your daily activities, set a time for them and mark them as check once they are completed.

VIEW CODE

Favorite Movies

iOS, Swift

One of the first iOS projects I created following a course from PluralSight. The application let's you create a list of your favorite movies by searching them with an API by OMDb and adding it to your list.

VIEW CODE

Portfolio

HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Sass, NPM Scripts

The site you are watching right now, created with the knowledge learnt from the first course of my specialization in React: Front-End Web UI Frameworks and Tools. I hope you guys like it, I'm constantly updating it and adding new projects to my portfolio.
